13.2: Input Search: Enter the information you want to filter for the table below (ex: Hotel Name, Channel, tracking range…)
13.3: Table List Hotel: This table show list hotel, Click to each line to view detail info of this hotel (will move to

14.1: Input Name: Enter name of Hotel
14.2: Input Price Tracking Range: Enter price tracking
14.3: Checkbox Adult Capacity: Check the number of adult in each room
14.4: Block Channel Info: Each block contains a channel information
14.5: Input URL Tracking: Enter the url to tracking this channel, after that click check button to check this link
14.6: Disable Input Channel Name: This field auto generate after check link url above
14.7: Table Competitors: This table show list competitor of this channel
14.8: Button Add New: Click this button to show modal box to add New Competitor and Price Spread
14.9: Button Remove Channel: Click this button to remove this channel
14.10: Button Add More Channel: Click this button to add more channel
14.11: Button Create: Click this button to Create new hotel

15.11: Button Update: Click this button to Update info hotel

personal.title: Profile Settings
personal.piSub: Manage this basic information — your name, email, and phone number.

recovery.title: Password and Account recovery options
recovery.title1: Control your password and account access, along with backup options if you get locked out of your account.
recovery.subTitle: Make sure you choose a strong password:
recovery.subTitle1: A strong password contains a mix of numbers, letters, and symbols. It is hard to guess, does not resemble a real word, and is only used for this account.
recovery.subNote: To change these settings, you will need to confirm your password.
recovery.subAccRec: If you forget your password or cannot access your account, we will use this information to help you get back in.

remove.title: Remove your account
remove.sub1: If you are no longer interested in using El-Metrix, you can delete them here.
remove.sub2: Your account will be consider to remove from our system. All of data will be removed, can't get back!
